channel.title: Height fix

item.title: Height fix
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

be more specific, i see no error there apart from how your command starts.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("train")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = 3209; teleportToY = 2801; height = 0; sendMessage("You teleport to the Training Area!"); }

item.title: Height fix
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Ok, im fixing the bugs in allstarscape but if i try to make if you teleport the height will set to 0 if get a error that the code of height is wrong i was coding a delta before but a forgot most of this.

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("train")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = 3209; teleportToY = 2801; height = 0; //HERE IS THE ERROR sendMessage( "You teleport to the Training Area!"); }
